Chula_Vista.Naval Base San Diego: Naval Base San Diego, which locals refer to as 32nd Street Naval Station, is the largest base of the United States Navy and is located in San Diego, California. Naval Base San Diego is the principal homeport of the Pacific Fleet, consisting of 50 ships and over 120 tenant commands. The base is composed of 13 piers stretched over 977 acres (3.95 km2) of land and 326 acres (1.32 km2) of water.
